section.section:
The Interagency Committee shall:
develop a system to provide services to frail or health-impaired seniors at risk of institutionalization; and
coordinate the system among the agencies represented on the Interagency Committee.
The Department shall administer the system for the Interagency Committee.

text.section:
The Interagency Committee, through the Department, shall work with local health departments, local departments of social services, area agencies, and local housing, transportation, economic development, and employment development officials to develop:
a system to designate case managers to secure and manage necessary services for each frail or health-impaired senior in need; and
guidelines to establish local or regional committees to coordinate the services system to implement this section.
